TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GlobalCatalog extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController

span.span: The class represents a global catalog server.

summary.span: Serwer wykazu globalnego jest kontrolerem domeny, który hostuje replikę wykazu globalnego.

span.span: A global catalog server is a domain controller that hosts a replica of the global catalog.

A object that represents the domain controller.
